title: Image of Trump with a saffron scarf and a pistol in his hand at the ‘Namaste Trump’ event is photoshopped
subtitle: The image in the post is a photoshopped one. In the original image, there is no scarf around the neck of Donald Trump. Also, there is no pistol in his hand.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image of Trump wearing the ‘Jai Sri Ram’ scarf around his neck and holding a pistol in his hand, at the ‘Namaste Trump’ event in Ahmedabad, is being widely shared on Facebook. Let’s check the authenticity of the image in the post.

Claim: Trump with the ‘Jai Sri Ram’ scarf around his neck and a pistol in his hand at the ‘Namaste Trump’ event. Fact: The image in the post is a photoshopped one. In the original image, there is no scarf around the neck of Trump. Also, there is no pistol in his hand. So, the claim is FALSE.

The original image can be seen in the photo library of ‘Getty Images’. The image is from the ‘Namaste Trump’ event held at the Sardar Patel Stadium in Motera, Ahmedabad. It shows US President Donald Trump waving his hand at the audience in the stadium.

To conclude, the image of Trump with the ‘Jai Sri Ram’ scarf around his neck and a pistol in his hand at the ‘Namaste Trump’ event is photoshopped.
